add-button.name: add-button
add-button.description: Add a button to assign/unassign a role.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Set the channel where the roles messsage is or will be.

copy-message.name: copy-message
copy-message.description: Copy an existing message in the roles channel.

edit-message.name: edit-message
edit-message.description: Edit the configured message using the contents of another message.

help.name: help
help.description: Read the help message about how to configure roles and buttons.

message.name: message
message.description: Set the message that you want to add or remove roles to.

remove-button.name: remove-button
remove-button.description: Remove a button from the set message.

role.name: role
role.description: Role that you want to remove its button.
